item.title: 25.04.2016 | Publication: SimLoRD – Simulation of Long Read Data
item.description: Bianca Stöcker; Johannes Köster; Sven Rahmann Bioinformatics 2016; 10.1093/bioinformatics/btw286 SimLoRD is a read simulator for third generation sequencing reads and is currently focused on the Pacific Biosciences SMRT error model. Third generation sequencing methods provide longer reads than second generation methods and have distinct error characteristics. In a SMRT library the sequenced DNA fragments are circular with adapter sequences between forward and backward strand, and a fragment may be sequenced multiple times in a single run.
